name: Peanut Butter Honey Balls
description: Get more one-handed appetizer ideas here » The trick to these balls is to serve them well-chilled. Poke a long skewer in each morsel to make them even more fun to eat....

recipeInstructions.text: Using a mixer or a well-muscled arm, mix together the peanut butter, honey and powdered milk.
Shape the peanut butter mixture into 1-inch balls (about the size of a walnut).
Set balls on a baking sheet. Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
